pages.text: Meiyou canji er anzuo jiazhong de xinshi, yu ping ziji de caichan he shengming wei zhu dao er fendou de xinshi, bici shi bu xiangtong de. Ping ziji de caichan he shengming er kangzhan de ren, an la shi tamen chaoguo anzuo zai jiazhong de ren yi ji. An la yingxu zhe liang deng ren yao shou zui youhou de baochou. Chu anzuo zhe suo shou de baochou wai, an la jia ci kangzhan de ren yi zhong zhongda de baochou——
cong an la fachu de xuduo pinji, she you, he ci'en. An la shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de

Zai zi qi de qingzhuang zhi xia zhong tianshi shi qi siwang de ren, zhong tianshi biding wen tamen shuo:“Shengqian nimen shi zai shenme qingzhuang zhi xia ne!” Tamen shuo:“Women zai difang shang shi bei ren qifu de.” Tamen wen:“Nandao an la de dadi bushi kuankuo de, neng rong nimen qianyi de ma? Zhe deng ren de guisu shi huo yu, na shi yige elie de guisu
Wei lao ruo he furu, tamen ji wuli qianyi, you bu renshi daolu
Zhe deng ren, an la huoxu raoshu tamen. An la shi zhi shu de, shi zhi she de

Shei wei zhu dao er qianyi, shei zai da dishang faxian xuduo chulu, he fengfu de caiyuan. Shei cong jia zhong chuzou, yu qian zhi an la he shizhe nali, er zhongtu siwang, an la bi baochou shei. An la shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de
Dang nimen zai da dishang luxing de shihou, jianqing bai gong, duiyu nimen shi wu zui de, ruguo nimen kongpa bu xindao zhe pohai nimen. Yin mei zhe que shi nimen de mingxian de choudi
